TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_ms'utux_tnuxan, title = ms'utux_tnuxan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/ms'utux_tnuxan} }

S.FORM: ms'utux tnuxan ita Tayal heya ga waya thoyay mhenas pcpung nku gaga m'likuy ru m'knrin nku mykyas ru mkrakis lga, thoyay pkkita la ru s'aras naha mbkis na gluw utux gaga, yaba yaya ru gluw utux sali, mosa smiye nku sali na krakis galan naha ina. kya ku waya mble pkkayan nku sa'ing sali na mbkis ru yaba yaya lga, thoyay naha spgluw gaga nku ps'onun naha mkkita nku mrkysa ru krakis ga tgiwan mosa pcrux utux sali. kwara yaw hani ga yaca san maha ms'utux tnuxan.

ms'otox tnoxan ita Tayal heya ga waya thoyay mhenas pcpong nko gaga m'likoy ro m'knrin nko mykyas ro mkrakis lga, thoyay pkkita la ro s'aras naha mbkis na glow otox gaga, yaba yaya ro glow otox sali, mosa smiye nko sali na krakis galan naha ina. kya ko waya mble pkkayan nko sa'ing sali na mbkis ro yaba yaya lga, thoyay naha spglow gaga nko ps'onon naha mkkita nko mrkysa ro krakis ga tgiwan mosa pcrox otox sali. kwara yaw hani ga yaca san maha ms'otox tnoxan.
